 typedef enum  svt_axi_port_configuration::reordering_algorithm_enum
Enumerated type that indicates the reordering algorithm used for ordering the transactions or responses.
ROUND_ROBIN( `SVT_AXI_REORDERING_ROUND_ROBIN )
Transactions will be processed in the order they are received.
RANDOM( `SVT_AXI_REORDERING_RANDOM )
Transactions will be processed in any random order, irrespective of the order they are received.
PRIORITIZED( `SVT_AXI_REORDERING_PRIORITIZED )
Transactions will be processed in a prioritized order. The priority of a transaction is known from the svt_axi_transaction :: reordering_priority attribute of that transaction.

 typedef enum  svt_axi_port_configuration::reordering_window_enum
Enumerated type that indicates how the reordering depth of transactions moves.

Example: Consider the read data reordering depth of 2; R1, R2, R3 and R4 are the read transactions to be responded. The behavior for different types reordering depth is as follows:

  • STATIC: Once both R1 and R2 are complete, then only the reordering depth moves: {R1, R2} -- to --> {R3, R4}
  • MOVING: If any of the R1 or R2 is complete, then the reordering depth moves. Suppose that R2 is complete before R1. Then the reordering depth window moves as: {R1, R2} -- to --> {R1, R3}
STATIC( `SVT_REORDERING_WINDOW_STATIC )
The reordering depth moves when all transactions within the current reordering depth are complete.
MOVING( `SVT_REORDERING_WINDOW_MOVING )
A new transaction is considered for access to send read data as part of the given reordering depth when any transaction within the current reordering depth is complete.

 typedef enum  svt_axi_port_configuration::reset_type_enum
Enumerated type that defines the behaviour of the VIP during reset
EXCLUDE_UNSTARTED_XACT( `SVT_AXI_EXCLUDE_UNSTARTED_XACT )
Only those transactions which have gone out on the interface are ABORTED.
RESET_ALL_XACT( `SVT_AXI_RESET_ALL_XACT )
All transactions which have already started along with the ones which have not yet started but are present in the internal queue are ABORTED.

 typedef enum  svt_axi_port_configuration::single_outstanding_per_id_kind_enum
This enumerated type controls the AxID when svt_axi_port_configuration :: single_outstanding_per_id_enable is set to 1.

If svt_axi_port_configuration :: single_outstanding_per_id_kind is set to 'MODIFY_SAME_ID': If AxID of a new Non Device or Non DVM transaction matches AxID of an active transaction, the VIP modifies the AxID such that the AxID is not overlapping with AxID of any active Non Device or Non DVM transactions.

For example, a new Non Device or Non DVM transaction with AxID = 6 is initiated by the user sequence. At this time, another Non Device or Non DVM with AxID = 6 is already in progress. In this case, VIP will check the active queue, and modify the AxID of the new transaction to an un-used AxID. For example, VIP will modify the AxID of new transaction to 4, if this is not used by any active transactions.

If svt_axi_port_configuration :: single_outstanding_per_id_kind is set to WAIT_FOR_COMPLETION_OF_SAME_ID': If AxID of a new Non Device or Non DVM transaction matches AxID of an active Non Device or Non DVM transaction, the VIP waits till the corresponding active Non Device or Non DVM transaction is complete. Only when the active Non Device or Non DVM transaction is complete, VIP adds the new Non Device or Non DVM transaction to the active queue. This ensures that only 1 active Non Device or Non DVM transaction exists for a given AxID.

For example, a new Non Device or Non DVM transaction with AxID = 6 is initiated by the user sequence. At this time, another Non Device or Non DVM with AxID = 6 is already in progress. In this case, VIP will wait for the active transaction to complete. After active transaction is complete, VIP will add the new transaction with AxID = 6 to the active queue.

MODIFY_SAME_ID(0)
WAIT_FOR_COMPLETION_OF_SAME_ID(1)

 typedef enum  svt_axi_port_configuration::snoop_response_data_transfer_mode_enum
SNOOP_RESP_DATA_TRANSFER_USING_CDDATA( `SVT_AXI_SNOOP_RESP_DATA_TRANSFER_USING_CDDATA )
Transfers cache data of dirty line using CDDATA channel
SNOOP_RESP_DATA_TRANSFER_USING_WB_WC( `SVT_AXI_SNOOP_RESP_DATA_TRANSFER_USING_WB_WC )
Transfers cache data of dirty line using WRITEBACK or WRITECLEAN

 typedef enum  svt_axi_port_configuration::snoop_response_mode_during_mem_update_type_enum
Enumerated type that defines the snoop response mode during memory update transactions
SUSPEND_SNOOP_DURING_MEM_UPDATE(0)
Master suspends incoming snoop request if memory update transaction is found in the buffer, or is active at the time of receiving snoop request and provides response to that snoop request only after the current ongoing memory update transaction is complete
SUSPEND_SNOOP_DURING_MEM_UPDATE_IN_PROGRESS(1)
Master suspends incoming snoop request if memory update transaction is found to be active (addres/data phase started or about to start in current clock) at the time of receiving snoop request and provides response to that snoop request only after the current ongoing memory update transaction is complete
RESPOND_SNOOP_DURING_MEM_UPDATE(2)
Master doesn't suspend incoming snoop request even if memory update transaction is found to be active at the time of receiving snoop request. Instead it responds to the snoop request with allowed snoop response while memory update transaction is in progress.
EITHER_RESPOND_OR_SUSPEND_SNOOP_DURING_MEM_UPDATE(3)
Master either suspends incoming snoop request or respond to the snoop request while memory update transaction is in progress in a random manner.

 typedef enum  svt_axi_port_configuration::source_master_id_xmit_to_slaves_type_enum
STATIC_SOURCE_MASTER_ID_XMIT_TO_SLAVES(0)
DYNAMIC_SOURCE_MASTER_ID_XMIT_TO_SLAVES(1)
CUSTOM_SOURCE_MASTER_ID_XMIT_TO_SLAVES(2)

 typedef enum  svt_axi_port_configuration::wdata_val_enum
Enumerated type to specify inactive wdata bytes of signals.
INACTIVE_WDATA_BYTE_LOW_VAL( `SVT_AXI_INACTIVE_WDATA_BYTE_LOW_VAL )
Signal is driven to 0. For multi-bit signals each bit is driven to 0.
INACTIVE_WDATA_BYTE_HIGH_VAL( `SVT_AXI_INACTIVE_WDATA_BYTE_HIGH_VAL )
Signal is driven to 1. For multi-bit signals each bit is driven to 1.
INACTIVE_WDATA_BYTE_X_VAL( `SVT_AXI_INACTIVE_WDATA_BYTE_X_VAL )
Signal is driven to X. For multi-bit signals each bit is driven to X.
INACTIVE_WDATA_BYTE_Z_VAL( `SVT_AXI_INACTIVE_WDATA_BYTE_Z_VAL )
Signal is driven to Z. For multi-bit signals each bit is driven to Z.
INACTIVE_WDATA_BYTE_RAND_VAL( `SVT_AXI_INACTIVE_WDATA_BYTE_RAND_VAL )
Signal is driven to a random value.
INACTIVE_WDATA_BYTE_UNCHANGED_VAL( `SVT_AXI_INACTIVE_WDATA_BYTE_UNCHANGED_VAL )
Signal is driven to initial value.

Member Constraint Documentation

  constraint
 svt_axi_port_configuration::exclude_port_configuration_unimplemented_features

This constraint insures that unimplemented features are avoided during randomization.
constraint exclude_port_configuration_unimplemented_features {
      if ((axi_interface_type == AXI4) || (axi_interface_type == AXI_ACE) || (axi_interface_type == ACE_LITE)) {
       if (axi_interface_category != AXI_READ_ONLY) {
         awid_enable == 1;
         awlen_enable == 1;
         awsize_enable == 1;
         awburst_enable == 1;
         awlock_enable == 1;
         awcache_enable == 1;
         awprot_enable == 1;
         wstrb_enable == 1;
         wlast_enable == 1;
         bid_enable == 1;
         bresp_enable == 1;
         awregion_enable == 1;
         awqos_enable == 1;
       }
       if (axi_interface_category != AXI_WRITE_ONLY) {
         arid_enable == 1;
         arlen_enable == 1;
         arsize_enable == 1;
         arburst_enable == 1;
         arlock_enable == 1;
         arcache_enable == 1;
         arprot_enable == 1;
         rid_enable == 1;
         rresp_enable == 1;
         rlast_enable == 1;
          arregion_enable == 1;
         arqos_enable == 1;
       }
     }
     if (axi_interface_type == AXI4_LITE) {
      if (axi_interface_category != AXI_READ_ONLY) {
        awprot_enable == 1;
        wstrb_enable == 1;
        bresp_enable == 1;
      }
      if (axi_interface_category != AXI_WRITE_ONLY) {
        arprot_enable == 1;
        rresp_enable == 1;
      }
    }
  }

    }

  constraint
 svt_axi_port_configuration::reasonable_barrier_id_val

constraint reasonable_barrier_id_val {
    if (barrier_id_overlap == 0) {
      if (use_separate_rd_wr_chan_id_width == 0) {
        barrier_id_min inside { [ ((1<<id_width)/2) : (((3*(1<<id_width))/4)) ] };
      } else if (read_chan_id_width < write_chan_id_width) {
        barrier_id_min inside { [ ((1<<read_chan_id_width)/2) : (((3*(1<<read_chan_id_width))/4)) ] };
      } else {
        barrier_id_min inside { [ ((1<<write_chan_id_width)/2) : (((3*(1<<write_chan_id_width))/4)) ] };
      }
      if (use_separate_rd_wr_chan_id_width == 0) {
        barrier_id_max inside { [ ((1<<id_width)/2) : (((3*(1<<id_width))/4)) ] };
      } else if (read_chan_id_width < write_chan_id_width) {
        barrier_id_max inside { [ ((1<<read_chan_id_width)/2) : (((3*(1<<read_chan_id_width))/4)) ] };
      } else {
        barrier_id_max inside { [ ((1<<write_chan_id_width)/2) : (((3*(1<<write_chan_id_width))/4)) ] };
      }
      barrier_id_max > barrier_id_min;
    }
  }

  constraint
 svt_axi_port_configuration::reasonable_buffer_values_for_structural_dependency

constraint reasonable_buffer_values_for_structural_dependency {
   axi_slv_channel_buffers_enable == 0;
   axi_wr_addr_buffer == 16;
   axi_wr_data_buffer == 4096;
   axi_wr_resp_buffer == 16;
   axi_rd_addr_buffer == 16;
   axi_rd_resp_buffer == 4096;
  }

 svt_axi_port_configuration::reasonable_buser_enable_val

  }

  constraint
 svt_axi_port_configuration::reasonable_dvm_id_val

constraint reasonable_dvm_id_val {
    if (dvm_id_overlap == 0) {
      if (use_separate_rd_wr_chan_id_width == 0) {
        dvm_id_min inside { [ (((3*(1<<id_width))/4))+1 : ((1<<id_width)-1) ] };
      } else {
        dvm_id_min inside { [ (((3*(1<<read_chan_id_width))/4))+1 : ((1<<read_chan_id_width)-1) ] };
      }
      if (use_separate_rd_wr_chan_id_width == 0) {
        dvm_id_max inside { [ (((3*(1<<id_width))/4))+1 : ((1<<id_width)-1) ] };
      } else {
        dvm_id_max inside { [ (((3*(1<<read_chan_id_width))/4))+1 : ((1<<read_chan_id_width)-1) ] };
      }
      dvm_id_max > dvm_id_min;
    }
  }

 svt_axi_port_configuration::solve_order

    primary_props == 1;

  constraint
 svt_axi_port_configuration::valid_ranges

constraint valid_ranges {
      cache_line_state_change_type inside {RECOMMENDED_CACHE_LINE_STATE_CHANGE,LEGAL_WITH_SNOOP_FILTER_CACHE_LINE_STATE_CHANGE,LEGAL_WITHOUT_SNOOP_FILTER_CACHE_LINE_STATE_CHANGE};
     (axi_interface_type == AXI3 || axi_interface_type == AXI4_LITE ||
      axi_interface_type == AXI_ACE || axi_interface_type == ACE_LITE ) -> (axi_interface_category == AXI_READ_WRITE);
       id_width inside {[0: 8]};
      read_chan_id_width inside {[0: 8]};
      write_chan_id_width inside {[0: 8]};
       if (axi_port_kind == AXI_MASTER)
         {
            if((axi_interface_category == AXI_READ_ONLY)|| (axi_interface_category == AXI_WRITE_ONLY))
           {
          exclusive_access_enable == 0;
          exclusive_monitor_enable == 0;
           }
         }
        barrier_id_min >= 0;
      if (use_separate_rd_wr_chan_id_width == 0) {
        barrier_id_min <= ((1<<(id_width))-1);
      } else if (read_chan_id_width < write_chan_id_width) {
        barrier_id_min <= ((1<<(read_chan_id_width))-1);
      } else {
        barrier_id_min <= ((1<<(write_chan_id_width))-1);
      }
      barrier_id_max >= 0;
      if (use_separate_rd_wr_chan_id_width == 0) {
        barrier_id_max <= ((1<<(id_width))-1);
      } else if (read_chan_id_width < write_chan_id_width) {
        barrier_id_max <= ((1<<(read_chan_id_width))-1);
      } else {
        barrier_id_max <= ((1<<(write_chan_id_width))-1);
      }
      barrier_id_min < barrier_id_max;
      dvm_id_min >= 0;
      if (use_separate_rd_wr_chan_id_width == 0) {
        dvm_id_min <= ((1<<(id_width))-1);
      } else {
        dvm_id_min <= ((1<<(read_chan_id_width))-1);
      }
      dvm_id_max >= 0;
      if (use_separate_rd_wr_chan_id_width == 0) {
        dvm_id_max <= ((1<<(id_width))-1);
      } else {
        dvm_id_max <= ((1<<(read_chan_id_width))-1);
      }
      dvm_id_min < dvm_id_max;
       addr_width inside {[1:( 64-num_enabled_tagged_addr_attributes)]};
      addr_user_width inside {[1: 4]};
      log_base_2_data_width inside {[ 3:log_base_2_max_data_width]};
                                  if (log_base_2_data_width < 8) {
        log_base_2_cache_line_size inside {[4:((log_base_2_data_width-3)+4)]};
      } else {
        log_base_2_cache_line_size inside {[(log_base_2_data_width-3):(((log_base_2_data_width-3)+4))]};
      }
       if (log_base_2_data_width < 8) {
        log_base_2_atomicity_size inside {[4:((log_base_2_data_width-3)+4)]};
      } else {
        log_base_2_atomicity_size inside {[(log_base_2_data_width-3):(((log_base_2_data_width-3)+4))]};
      }
       if (log_base_2_max_snoop_data_width < (log_base_2_cache_line_size+3))
        log_base_2_snoop_data_width inside {[((log_base_2_cache_line_size+3)-4):log_base_2_max_snoop_data_width]};
      else
        log_base_2_snoop_data_width inside {[((log_base_2_cache_line_size+3)-4):(log_base_2_cache_line_size+3)]};
      data_width == (1 << log_base_2_data_width);
      data_user_width inside {[1: 4]};
      resp_user_width inside {[1: 4]};
      cache_line_size == (1 << log_base_2_cache_line_size);
      snoop_data_width == (1 << log_base_2_snoop_data_width);
      if ( atomicity_size > -1)
      atomicity_size == (1 << log_base_2_atomicity_size);
                                  num_cache_lines inside {[ 1: 1024]};
      num_outstanding_xact inside {-1,[1: 128]};
      num_read_outstanding_xact inside {[1: 128]};
      num_write_outstanding_xact inside {[1: 128]};
      num_outstanding_snoop_xact inside {[1: 10]};
      max_num_exclusive_access inside {[0: 4]};
      num_id_bits_used_in_exclusive_monitor inside {[0: 8-1]};
      (num_addr_bits_used_in_exclusive_monitor+num_initial_addr_bits_ignored_by_exclusive_monitor) inside {[0: 64-1]};
      write_data_interleave_depth inside {[1: 1]};
      read_data_reordering_depth inside {[1: 8]};
      read_data_interleave_size inside {[1: 4]};
      write_resp_reordering_depth inside {[1: 8]};
       (tdata_enable == 0) -> (tstrb_enable == 0);
      tdata_width inside {[8: 128]};
      tdata_width == ((tdata_width >> 3) << 3);
      tid_width inside {[1: 8]};
      tdest_width inside {[1: 4]};
      tuser_width inside {[1: 8]};
     if (axi_interface_type == AXI3) {
      awid_enable == 1;
      awlen_enable == 1;
      awsize_enable == 1;
      awburst_enable == 1;
      awlock_enable == 1;
      awcache_enable == 1;
      awprot_enable == 1;
      wstrb_enable == 1;
      wlast_enable == 1;
      bid_enable == 1;
      bresp_enable == 1;
      arid_enable == 1;
      arlen_enable == 1;
      arsize_enable == 1;
      arburst_enable == 1;
      arlock_enable == 1;
      arcache_enable == 1;
      arprot_enable == 1;
      rid_enable == 1;
      rresp_enable == 1;
      rlast_enable == 1;
       awregion_enable == 0;
      awqos_enable == 0;
      arregion_enable == 0;
      arqos_enable == 0;
      barrier_enable == 0;
      dvm_enable == 0;
    } else {
      locked_access_enable == 0;
    }
     if (axi_interface_type == AXI4_LITE) {
      awprot_enable == 1;
      wstrb_enable == 1;
      bresp_enable == 1;
      arprot_enable == 1;
      rresp_enable == 1;
      awlen_enable == 0;
      arlen_enable == 0;
      awsize_enable == 0;
      arsize_enable == 0;
      awburst_enable == 0;
      arburst_enable == 0;
      awlock_enable == 0;
      arlock_enable == 0;
      awcache_enable == 0;
      arcache_enable == 0;
      wlast_enable == 0;
      rlast_enable == 0;
      data_width inside {32, 64};
       if (id_reflection_enable == 1) {
        awid_enable == 1;
        bid_enable == 1;
        rid_enable == 1;
      }
       exclusive_access_enable == 0;
      exclusive_monitor_enable == 0;
      barrier_enable == 0;
      dvm_enable == 0;
     }
    if ((axi_interface_type == AXI_ACE) || (axi_interface_type == ACE_LITE)) {
      if (snoop_filter_enable == 1)
        cache_line_state_change_type != LEGAL_WITHOUT_SNOOP_FILTER_CACHE_LINE_STATE_CHANGE;
      else
        cache_line_state_change_type != LEGAL_WITH_SNOOP_FILTER_CACHE_LINE_STATE_CHANGE;
    }
     if((axi_interface_type == AXI_ACE) && (dvm_enable == 1))
      addr_width >= 32;
     if ((axi_port_kind == AXI_MASTER) &&
        ((axi_interface_type == AXI4) || (axi_interface_type == AXI_ACE) || (axi_interface_type == ACE_LITE))) {
      if (axi_interface_category == AXI_READ_WRITE) {
        awprot_enable == 1;
        wlast_enable == 1;
        arprot_enable == 1;
      }
      if (axi_interface_category == AXI_READ_ONLY) {
        arprot_enable == 1;
        awid_enable == 0;
        awlen_enable == 0;
        awsize_enable == 0;
        awburst_enable == 0;
        awlock_enable == 0;
        wstrb_enable == 0;
        awregion_enable == 0;
        awcache_enable == 0;
        awqos_enable == 0;
      }
      if (axi_interface_category == AXI_WRITE_ONLY) {
        awprot_enable == 1;
        wlast_enable == 1;
        arid_enable == 0;
        arlen_enable == 0;
        arsize_enable == 0;
        arburst_enable == 0;
        arlock_enable == 0;
        arregion_enable == 0;
        arcache_enable == 0;
        arqos_enable == 0;
      }
    }
     if (axi_port_kind == AXI_SLAVE) {
      if ((axi_interface_type == AXI4) || (axi_interface_type == AXI_ACE) || (axi_interface_type == ACE_LITE)) {
        write_resp_wait_for_addr_accept == 1;
        if (axi_interface_category == AXI_READ_WRITE) {
          awid_enable == 1;
          awlen_enable == 1;
          awsize_enable == 1;
          awburst_enable == 1;
          wstrb_enable == 1;
          bid_enable == 1;
          arid_enable == 1;
          arlen_enable == 1;
          arsize_enable == 1;
          arburst_enable == 1;
          rid_enable == 1;
          rlast_enable == 1;
        }
        if (axi_interface_category == AXI_READ_ONLY) {
          arid_enable == 1;
          arlen_enable == 1;
          arsize_enable == 1;
          arburst_enable == 1;
          rid_enable == 1;
          rlast_enable == 1;
          awid_enable == 0;
          awlen_enable == 0;
          awsize_enable == 0;
          awburst_enable == 0;
          wstrb_enable == 0;
          bid_enable == 0;
          awregion_enable == 0;
          awcache_enable == 0;
          awqos_enable == 0;
          awlock_enable == 0;
          awprot_enable == 0;
          wlast_enable == 0;
          bresp_enable == 0;
        }
        if (axi_interface_category == AXI_WRITE_ONLY) {
          awid_enable == 1;
          awlen_enable == 1;
          awsize_enable == 1;
          awburst_enable == 1;
          wstrb_enable == 1;
          bid_enable == 1;
          arid_enable == 0;
          arlen_enable == 0;
          arsize_enable == 0;
          arburst_enable == 0;
          rid_enable == 0;
          rlast_enable == 0;
          arregion_enable == 0;
          arcache_enable == 0;
          arqos_enable == 0;
          arlock_enable == 0;
          arprot_enable == 0;
          rresp_enable == 0;
        }
      }
    }
     if (axi_interface_type == ACE_LITE)
      writeevict_enable == 0;
     if (writeevict_enable == 1) awunique_enable == 1;
         if (locked_access_enable)
      num_outstanding_xact != -1;
     if (axi_slv_channel_buffers_enable)
      toggle_ready_signals_during_idle_period == 0;
   }
